visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include a legend with a square border and specific chart margins and background settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The x-axis represents months with styled labels, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius with a styled title. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied. The legend has a square border, and the chart has specific margins and a light background color for better readability. The spline chart type is chosen for its smooth line representation, suitable for showing trends over time.
